servinfo.title: DTC P0117: Engine Coolant Temperature Circuit Low

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to DTC P0116: Engine Coolant Temperature Circuit Range / Performance:For Petrol Engine Model .

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: Voltage of ECT sensor output is less than 0.2 V for 0.5 sec continuously
(High engine coolant temperature (low voltage / low resistance))

s1.ptxt: With ignition switch turned OFF, connect scan tool.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC using scan tool.
Start engine and run it for 10 sec. or more.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions for DTC Troubleshooting:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check:For Petrol Engine Model .

testgroup.title: ECT sensor and its circuit check

test1.ptxt: Connect scan tool with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check engine coolant temp. displayed on scan tool.

testgroup.question: Is 130 °C (266 °F) indicated?

paragroup.ptxt: Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection .

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from ECT sensor with ignition switch turned OFF.
Check for proper connection to ECT sensor at “PPL/YEL” and “GRY/GRN” wire terminals.
If OK, then turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between “PPL/YEL” wire terminal of ECT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.
Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Measure resistance between “PPL/YEL” wire terminal of ECT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.

paragroup.ptxt: “PPL/YEL” wire is shorted to ground circuit.
If wire is OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Measure voltage between “PPL/YEL” wire terminal of ECT sensor connector and vehicle body ground.

paragroup.ptxt: “PPL/YEL” wire is shorted to other circuit.
If wire is OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

test1.ptxt: Check ECT sensor according to Engine Coolant Temperature (ECT) Sensor Inspection:For Petrol Engine Model .

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.
